import React,{useState}from'react';import ProductCard from'./components/ProductCard';import Cart from'./components/Cart';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory]=useState('Все');// Состояние для выбранной категории
const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);const[searchTerm,setSearchTerm]=useState('');// Состояние для поиска
const products=[{id:1,name:'Футболка',price:1500,size:'M',image:`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/img/shirt.jpg`,category:'Одежда'},{id:2,name:'Кроссовки',price:5000,size:'42',image:`${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/img/sneakers.jpg`,category:'Обувь'}];// Фильтрация товаров по категории и поисковому запросу
const filteredProducts=products.filter(product=>{const matchesCategory=selectedCategory==='Все'||product.category===selectedCategory;const matchesSearchTerm=product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase());return matchesCategory&&matchesSearchTerm;});const addToCart=product=>{setCartItems([...cartItems,product]);};const removeFromCart=id=>{setCartItems(cartItems.filter(item=>item.id!==id));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u041C\u0430\u0433\u0430\u0437\u0438\u043D \u043E\u0434\u0435\u0436\u0434\u044B \u0438 \u043E\u0431\u0443\u0432\u0438"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\u041F\u043E\u0438\u0441\u043A \u043F\u043E \u0442\u043E\u0432\u0430\u0440\u0430\u043C...",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>setSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory('Все'),children:"\u0412\u0441\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory('Одежда'),children:"\u041E\u0434\u0435\u0436\u0434\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory('Обувь'),children:"\u041E\u0431\u0443\u0432\u044C"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:filteredProducts.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product,addToCart:addToCart},product.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cart,{cartItems:cartItems,removeFromCart:removeFromCart})]});};export default App;
